mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flipnet.flipnet_serial( gmt_created, gmt_modified, inst_id, reference_id, operator, ability_code, exchange_amount, request_message, response_message, receipt, merchant_id, time_served, external_serial_no, status) VALUES (#{gmtCreated}, #{gmtModified}, #{instId}, #{referenceId}, #{operator}, #{abilityCode}, #{exchangeAmount}, #{requestMessage}, #{responseMessage}, #{receipt}, #{merchantId}, #{timeServed}, #{externalSerialNo}, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM flipnet.flipnet_serial WHERE gmt_created between #{start} and #{end} and status = 'PE'
